challenge.title: The Theory and Technique of Electronic Music - Miller Puckette
challenge.description: Miller Puckette's Pure Data tutorial book The Theory and Technique of Electronic Music is an introduction to coding music using the free and open source application Pure Data.
challenge.instructions: Complete The Theory and Technique of Electronic Music's tutorial, and program some songs!

pageContext.name: The Theory and Technique of Electronic Music - Miller Puckette
